item.description:
We have secured the entire Lens Pro To Go building for the whole day which has 4 full studio setups with lights as well as a ton of extra space to setup your own equipment.
we have already got commitments from half a dozen experienced models and i hope to have at least a dozen in total which I don't think will be hard to accomplish since we have enough time to plan.

A few quick notes
BRING A POCKET WIZARD IF YOU HAVE ONE OR CAN BORROW ONE
LPTG has good studio lights for all there studios but feel free to bring the rest of your equipment or even lights if you want to.
refreshments will be provided all day and we will order pizza for lunch as part of the fee
im estimating the $35 as i just really want the fee to cover costs of the building MUA's and the food so as we get closer and i know how many people are coming it might change but it will only go down theres no way it would cost more then this.
BRING PROPS and ideas of what you want to do and feel free to start talking about the event on the board maybe there are other people that really want to do something that you want to do as well and you can collaborate.
Registration opens at 9 for paperwork and model releases but I will be there at 8 for anyone that shows up a bit early.
You can prepay $35 to help cover upfront costs or pay at the event.

The Models. more will be added as they are confirmed
Vapor Eyes
YoukoSunshine
Ashley Amber Bottoms
Harley Quinn
Phroot
AngeliqueModels
Shelley Nault
SarinaH
Solacium
item.how_to_find_us: You can unload at the loading dock right at the studio but we ask that everyone parks at there parking lot on Wnithrop St and then there is a bridge in the back corner you walk across right the the front door.
item.name: The Great Model Shoot
